TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartConnectionsEventHandler(object sender, WebPartConnectionsEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartConnectionsEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartConnectionsEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartConnectionsEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartConnectionsEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartConnectionsEventArgs ^ e);
type WebPartConnectionsEventHandler = delegate of obj * WebPartConnectionsEventArgs -> unit

Docs.summary: 表示将用于处理 控件的 和 事件的方法。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler>类定义出现的两个事件处理程序委托<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件：<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>事件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>事件。 处理的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>事件是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A>方法。 处理的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>事件是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A>方法。 在这两种情况下，事件数据包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs>对象。
